ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: On a path that is straight, --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and that you follow the right path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: On a Straight Path (i.e. on Allah's religion of Islamic Monotheism).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [36:4] on a (‘alā is semantically connected to the preceding [statement]) straight path, that is, [you follow] the way of the prophets before you, [enjoining] the affirmation of God’s Oneness and guidance (the emphasis   expressed by the oath [in ‘by the definitive Qur’ān’] and the remainder [of the statement] is a response to the disbelievers’ saying to him, ‘You have not been sent [by God]!’ [Q. 13:43].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (On a straight path) you are holding firm to an established religion with which Allah is pleased, i.e. Islam.
